entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
